Title: Directs the superintendent of financial services to study the relationship between patient access to care and treatment of Lyme disease and health insurance coverage
Summary: Directs the superintendent of financial services, in consultation with the commissioner of health, to study the relationship between patient access to care and treatment of Lyme disease and health insurance coverage.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the superintendent of financial services to study the relationship between patient access to care and treatment of Lyme disease and health insurance coverage
